sentences.en: A minor oscillation of the surface is experienced and a ground shock is produced.
sentences.cn: 地面受到轻度振动,并产生地下冲击波.

sentences.en: It follows that with the voltage on, the losses are high, so oscillation is prevented.
sentences.cn: 由此可见,加上电压后, 损耗增大, 因此振荡受到阻止.

sentences.en: It is possible to follow the complete buildup of oscillation.
sentences.cn: 了解振荡建立的整个过程是可能的.

sentences.en: Its oscillation depends on the strength of the gravitational field.
sentences.cn: 它的振动幅度取决于引力场的强度。

sentences.en: Non - sinusoidal oscillation device of mold is explored and applied.
sentences.cn: 开发并应用了椭圆齿轮驱动结晶器非正弦振动装置.

sentences.en: One of the features of a forced oscillation is the energy in the oscillation.
sentences.cn: 受迫振动的特点之一是振动的能量.

sentences.en: Power System Stabilizers ( PSS ) are effective in damping the low frequency oscillation.
sentences.cn: 电力系统稳定器 ( PSS ) 的应用,在抑制低频振荡方面取得了明显的效果.

sentences.en: Rate of signal oscillation in hertz.
sentences.cn: 信号振荡的速率,以赫兹(Hz) 为单位.

sentences.en: Several problems are solved in order to demonstrate various cases of oscillation.
sentences.cn: 几个问题得到解决,以表明振荡各种案件.

sentences.en: Some oscillation of the fuselage had been noticed on early flights.
sentences.cn: 在之前的几次飞行中，就已经察觉到机身有些摇晃。

sentences.en: Standard & Poor 500 index Friday's oscillation amplitude also achieves about 7 %.
sentences.cn: 标准 普尔 500指数周五的振幅也达到7%左右.

sentences.en: The combustion process cannot couple to the feed system unless a flow oscillation exists.
sentences.cn: 不存在流动振荡,燃烧过程就不可能与供应系统耦合.

sentences.en: the oscillation of the compass needle
Used in TV gathering focus, oscillation frequency and timer circuits.
sentences.cn: 适用于电视聚焦, 振荡,定时回路.

sentences.en: With porous wick in the condenser, the system pressure oscillation was reduced.
sentences.cn: 冷凝器中多孔芯很好地抑制了系统中的温度压力波动现象.

words.tran_cn: [电子] 振荡器；摆动物；动摇的人

phrases.tran_cn: 阻尼振荡；阻尼振动；减幅振荡

trans.tran_en: oscillations are frequent changes between two extreme amounts or limits
